Traiano in Tracia

July 2019

Opera by André Catelli

Director: Morten K. Roesen

Conductor: Anthony Armore / Design: Todor Demerov / Costumes: Teodora Djambazova / Multimedia: Plamen Asenov

Chorus and Soloists and staff from State Opera Stara Zagora / Bulgarian historical group for rituals and stage fights: Bagatur
